Text:
The most valuable thing for me in this UL is that it's the first UL of E01-E03 of the HoC version.

Thanks!
quality, anyone? and how many episodes are these?
This is episodes 1-13 (complete Season 1), WEBRips, 720p, H.264, AAC 2.0

Screen capture is not in sync with the playback framerate which shows extended jitters. S01E06 has a brief moment when the Windows 7 taskbar shows. The encoder is using wireless to stream which can explain some skips.

Video quality is watchable, audio quality is poor. Wait for the HDTV or Bluray rips.

i don't think there's going to be hdtv rips, isn't it a Netflix exclusive show?  i'll probably suffer through the choppy webrips the show looked too good for me to wait forever for possible bluray release.
ignore my comment just noticed SKY started running the series
